desc.en: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第113首曲子，尤其用于第三篇第四章。其一般是阿里乌斯(奥利斯)小队的作战曲。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: arius purple hall church basilica ruin broken indoor daytime nighttime
desc.jp: arius purple hall church basilica ruin broken indoor daytime nighttime

desc.en: school campus entrance view arius broken cloudy grey ruin outside
desc.jp: school campus entrance view arius broken cloudy grey ruin outside

desc.en: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.jp: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.zh_cn: 来到{cn游戏开发部}的是{cn研讨会}部长{cf莉音}。{cf莉音}说{cf爱丽丝}是「无名诸神的王女」，并说{cf爱丽丝}是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但{cf莉音}很平静地在谈论{cf爱丽丝}可能会造成的{cf未来}。正当要爆发冲突时，{cnC&C}的第五个成员登场了。

desc.en: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.jp: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了{cf爱丽丝}的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而{cf莉音}则用游戏作了简单的阐述：{cf爱丽丝}是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones were partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.jp: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones were partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}向众人道歉，表示让{cf爱丽丝}接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为{cf爱丽丝}接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。{cf莉音}表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.jp: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.zh_cn: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将{cf爱丽丝}的光环破坏掉，即杀死{cf爱丽丝}。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。{cf莉音}首先表示了对{cf爱丽丝}作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，{cf莉音}叫来了一直在一旁的{cf宁瑠}清场。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.jp: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}表示，{cnC&C}本就直属她管理。{cf莉音}强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而{cf宁瑠}本身也对{cf莉音}的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但{cf莉音}很熟悉{cf宁瑠}，并早就做好了应对手段。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.jp: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.zh_cn: 主要成员集合的学园附近大致上已经整顿好了，但{cf小春}在遗迹地带附近陷入苦战当中。{cn茶会}的{cf弥香}突然登场，让战况开始出现了逆转。

desc.en: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.jp: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf小春}等{cn实现正义部}的成员都向{cf弥香}道谢。

desc.en: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.jp: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然一边已经打完了战斗，但{cf圣亚}感觉到教堂附近还有人没有撤离。{cf莲实}让{cf麻白}确认情况，果真如此。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

hobby.en: Collecting tea leaves, baking pastries, gardening
hobby.jp: 茶葉収集、お菓子作り、庭の手入れ
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 收集茶叶、制作点心、照料庭园
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 收集茶叶、制作点心、整理庭园
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 收集茶叶、制作点心、照料庭园

hobby.en: Climbing to high places, keeping an observational diary
hobby.jp: 高いところに登ること、観察日記を書くこと
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 登上高处、记录观察日记

desc.en: 麻白具體看到補課部（前為實現正義部）的小春正在孤身保護教堂裡的平民。蓮實立刻下令支援。
desc.jp: 麻白具體看到補課部（前為實現正義部）的小春正在孤身保護教堂裡的平民。蓮實立刻下令支援。
desc.zh_cn: {cf麻白}具体看到{cn补课部}（前为{cn实现正义部}）的{cf小春}正在孤身保护教堂里的平民。{cf莲实}立刻下令支援。

desc.en: 就在小春被包圍時，彌香闖了進來。儘管仍然被人謾罵為“叛徒”，但彌香並無理會，而是投入戰鬥中。
desc.jp: 就在小春被包圍時，彌香闖了進來。儘管仍然被人謾罵為“叛徒”，但彌香並無理會，而是投入戰鬥中。
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf小春}被包围时，{cf弥香}闯了进来。尽管仍然被人谩骂为“叛徒”，但{cf弥香}并无理会，而是投入战斗中。

name.en: 第4聖所「地下墓穴內部宗座聖殿」
name.jp: 第4聖所「地下墓穴內部宗座聖殿」
name.zh_cn: 第4圣所「地下墓穴内部宗座圣殿」

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

name.en: 第4聖所「地下墓穴內部宗座聖殿」
name.jp: 第4聖所「地下墓穴內部宗座聖殿」
name.zh_cn: 第4圣所「地下墓穴内部宗座圣殿」

desc.en: 為了攻略第4聖所，花子和修女會聚集在地下墓穴內部的宗座聖殿前。連奧利斯小隊也一起參戰了。後來穿著聖徒會服裝的櫻子也加入，並且開始攻略第4聖所。
desc.jp: 為了攻略第4聖所，花子和修女會聚集在地下墓穴內部的宗座聖殿前。連奧利斯小隊也一起參戰了。後來穿著聖徒會服裝的櫻子也加入，並且開始攻略第4聖所。
desc.zh_cn: 为了攻略第4圣所，{cf花子}和{cn修女会}聚集在地下墓穴内部的宗座圣殿前。连{cn奥利斯小队}也一起参战了。后来穿着圣徒会服装的{cf樱子}也加入，并且开始攻略第4圣所。

desc.en: 花子指出目前通往第四聖所的道路只有一條，恐怕難以集中火力。救援騎士團、修女會進行戰鬥，奧利斯小隊則主動請纓擔任後方防禦。
desc.jp: 花子指出目前通往第四聖所的道路只有一條，恐怕難以集中火力。救援騎士團、修女會進行戰鬥，奧利斯小隊則主動請纓擔任後方防禦。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}指出目前通往第四圣所的道路只有一条，恐怕难以集中火力。救援骑士团、{cn修女会}进行战斗，{cn奥利斯小队}则主动请缨担任后方防御。

desc.en: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第113首曲子，尤其用于第三篇第四章。其一般是阿里乌斯(奥利斯)小队的作战曲。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: school campus entrance view arius broken cloudy grey ruin outside
desc.jp: school campus entrance view arius broken cloudy grey ruin outside

desc.en: arius purple hall church basilica ruin broken indoor daytime nighttime
desc.jp: arius purple hall church basilica ruin broken indoor daytime nighttime

desc.en: 就在花子追問櫻子的下落時，櫻子突然穿著修女會的傳統服裝出現，結果引來花子的注意。不過最終，第四聖所攻略戰終於開始。
desc.jp: 就在花子追問櫻子的下落時，櫻子突然穿著修女會的傳統服裝出現，結果引來花子的注意。不過最終，第四聖所攻略戰終於開始。
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf花子}追问{cf樱子}的下落时，{cf樱子}突然穿着{cn修女会}的传统服装出现，结果引来{cf花子}的注意。不过最终，第四圣所攻略战终于开始。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
